department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Katherine Walker (SAIC BFA 2007) is currently a Senior Designer at VSA Partners and has had her work recognized in AIGA 365, STA Archive, Dwell, UnderConsideration, Computer Arts, and Communication Arts, among others. She sits on the board of AIGA Chicago as Community Outreach Chair and is the Director of AIGA's Mentor Program. Walker co-founded the highly touted Quite Strong—an all-female design collaborative focusing on community-oriented events and empowering creatives.
